minecraft:scatter_feature.iterations: t.x = v.worldx; t.z = v.worldz; v.noise1 = 0; v.noise2 = 0; v.noise3 = 0; v.curAmplitude = 0.5; v.i = t.x * 0.012500000186264515; v.j = t.z * 0.012500000186264515; v.i2 = -t.x * 0.014999999664723873; v.j2 = -t.z * 0.014999999664723873; loop(4, { v.noise1 = v.noise1 + (q.noise(v.i, v.j) * v.curAmplitude); v.i = v.i * 2; v.j = v.j * 2; v.noise2 = v.noise2 + (q.noise(v.i2, v.j2) * v.curAmplitude); v.i2 = v.i2 * 2; v.j2 = v.j2 * 2; v.noise3 = v.noise3 + (q.noise(0, 0) * v.curAmplitude); v.curAmplitude = v.curAmplitude * 0.25; }); v.noise1 = v.noise1 * 8; v.noise2 = v.noise2 * 24; v.noise3 = (v.noise3 - 0.1) * 4; t.ydev = (v.noise3 < 0)? v.noise1: (v.noise3 > 1)? v.noise2: v.noise1 + (v.noise2 - v.noise1) * v.noise3; t.height =  64 + t.ydev; t.layer = 63 > math.floor(t.height) ? math.floor(t.height) - 63 : 0; return 1;
